body.p: can be installed in two ways:

Use these instructions only when installing for the very first time on the workstation. If is already installed, use the Auto Version Update utility ( menu item: Utilities --> Auto Version Upgrade...).

ol.li: Open the Windows explorer and navigate to the place where you downloaded the install package to.
Start installation by double clicking on the install package.
Follow the instructions of the installation program.
After is successfully installed, a folder named "" is installed on the desktop as well as an icon named "".

body.p: Use these instructions only when has already been installed on the workstation.
body.note: Back up any translation material as described in "Reusing Version 1.0 translation material".

ol.li: Select the menu item: Utilities --> Auto Version Upgrade...
In the " Auto Version Upgrade" window, select the "Updates" tab (if it is not already selected).
Select (check) the checkbox next to the "" component.
Close the main window, by selecting the menu item: File --> Exit. Do not close the " Auto Version Upgrade" window.
Press the "Upgrade Selected" button to install this new version of .
Wait for the download to complete.
The installation program will automatically start when the download is successfully completed.
Follow the instructions of the installation program.
